refnamediv.refpurpose: service-side interface for the File Transfer channel type

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This section documents the auto-generated GInterface used to implement the File Transfer channel type.

refsect2.title: TpSvcChannelTypeFileTransfer
refsect2.para: Dummy typedef representing any implementation of this interface.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_file_transfer_accept_file_impl ()

refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method AcceptFile on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Type.FileTransfer.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_file_transfer_emit_file_transfer_state_changed ()
refsect2.programlisting: void tp_svc_channel_type_file_transfer_emit_file_transfer_state_changed (gpointer instance, guint arg_State, guint arg_Reason);
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the FileTransferStateChanged signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Type.FileTransfer.

refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the TransferredBytesChanged signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Type.FileTransfer.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_file_transfer_implement_accept_file ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the AcceptFile method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the AcceptFile D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_file_transfer_implement_provide_file ()

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the ProvideFile D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_file_transfer_return_from_accept_file ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.
